projects.name: Problems
projects.description: Revamping the UI with frontend heavy tech such as implementing tailwindCSS, material-tailwind to scale up modernization of best UI practices. Being able to save your progress and uploading it for future use.

projects.name: Solution
projects.description: Vibrant attention grabbing colors, easy to follow workflow

projects.name: Technical Challenges
